title: Help with Account
body:
Hey Riot,

I feel my account has been improperly suspended. I haven't played in months. I hopped on in August to play a few games and before that it was nearly a year since I last played. I decided to hit up League on Tuesday of this past week and I find out my account has been permanently suspended. I have many skins on the account, plus some extremely premium and rare skins, and I don't want to create another account. I'd like to get my account back if it has been wrongly suspended. I know I am not a toxic player, I even don't condone people I play with to act like that. Any help you can give me will be greatly appreciated. I put in a ticket for the incident, the ticket number is #23612748. I will give you guys any information you need to look more into the issue.

Thanks

Talonious

replies.body:
*Porocles* and I cannot discuss account specific stuff like suspensions here on the boards, but if you remain patient, an account specialist will get back to you on your ticket. Just as a heads-up, we've had a lot of ticket submitted recently, so response times may be a bit longer than normal.

Let me know if you have any questions.

We cannot comment about suspensions, Player Support  will give you more context, if not already. Usually, it means you were sharing your account and someone else did forbidden things. If I would go to Mars for 1 year, I know no one would use my account because I follow basic security/privacy measures.
